summary: Linkin Park is an American rock band that formed in 1996 in California. The band has seen several lineup changes, with the current members being Mike Shinoda, Brad Delson, Joe Hahn, Dave Farrell, Emily Armstrong, and Colin Brittain. They are known for their unique fusion of heavy metal, hip-hop, and electronic sounds, which gained international fame with their debut album, "Hybrid Theory." Linkin Park has sold over 100 million records worldwide and has won numerous awards, including two Grammy Awards. Their music has evolved over the years, and their upcoming album, "From Zero," is set to release in November 2024.
title: Linkin Park
